game.name: Help Will Come Tomorrow
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In an uninhabitable Siberian wilderness, in a wake of October Revolution, a group of passengers survives the mysterious catastrophe of Trans-Siberian railway train. They must endure in a harsh ice-clad climate until rescue arrives. Facing many dangers, their own weaknesses and, their own prejudice.

reviewHighlights.text: This game made me want to punch my monitor within 5mins I absolutely love it. I think I found this game after trying to find more brutal game like fun...
This game is exactly what I was looking for! There's quite a lot to keep track of, and you might feel overwhelmed, but it's better if you accept that...
